name: Maria T. Alonso, Ph.D.
description: Dr. Alonso is a psychologist who integrates Western evidence-based interventions with Eastern treatment approaches, drawing from Buddhist philosophy. She focuses on helping clients gain new perspectives and identify personal strengths

name: Tracy Hadel
description: Tracy Hadel is a counselor/therapist who is accepting clients interested in mindfulness. She works with all populations and is also a certified yoga therapist

name: Dr. Cara Bussell, PhD, LLC
description: Dr. Bussell is a psychologist who provides evidence-based support tailored to individual needs, helping clients navigate challenges like anxiety, grief, and life transitions

name: Larry Nussbaum, LIFE JOURNEY CENTER
description: Larry Nussbaum is a licensed clinical social worker who offers support and coaching, viewing problems as opportunities for growth and opening up lives to new levels of development

name: Dina Hijazi
description: Dina Hijazi is a psychologist who helps clients discover strengths, build resilience, and create fulfilling lives by equipping them with practical tools and self-understanding

name: Kansas Meditation Center (KMC)
address: Not explicitly listed, but serves Kansas
description: KMC is a Theravada Buddhist temple offering spiritual counseling, chaplaincy services, meditation sessions, and classes. They welcome people of all traditions

name: Chet Lesniak
description: Chet Lesniak is a psychologist who works with clients from Kansas, specializing in Buddhist philosophy, anxiety, LGBTQIA+ issues, life transitions, and stress management

name: Broderick Sawyer
description: Broderick Sawyer is a psychologist who works with clients from Kansas, specializing in Buddhist philosophy, existential challenges, race and cultural identity, relationship issues, and spirituality

name: Kimberly Winsor, LCSW
address: Online (provides telehealth to clients in KS)
description: Kimberly Winsor is a licensed clinical social worker whose practice helps clients learn techniques to lessen suffering and explore meaningful life paths, integrating Buddhist principles

name: GENEX Therapeutic Solutions, LLC
address: Not explicitly listed, but serves Kansas City, KS
description: GENEX Therapeutic Solutions, LLC, with practitioner Rae Bowerman, takes a trauma-informed approach and integrates Buddhist principles like mindfulness into their work
